channel.title: How To Start Playing Moparscape
channel.description:
[b][i]Created By Substance[/i][/b] I know that there are some guides out there on how to use moparscape but there have beenn many posts in this section of the forums of how to use moparscape.
This Step-By-Step guide was created entirely by me and was not leached off of any site or person.
Here Is Your Guide On " :) Beginning to Game on Moparscape :) "
[center]Guide to Moparscape (Everything you need to know about joining a server[/center]
[center]Step 1: Go To the Home Page of Moparscape.org where all the forums are located.
Step 2: Click on the RS2 Server Advertisement.
Step 3: Click a Thread of a server and enter that server's thread.
Step 4: Look For The Ip for the server (If a thread is in the right layout you should have no problem finding it.)
Step 5: Switch over to your mopar client and click on File in the top left corner of the Client.
Step 6: Click New Server and Paste the copied ip from the forums into it. (Make sure it is just the IP and no spaces are before or after the IP.
Step 7: Go to the Thread of the server and look for the port.
Step 8: Then Again switch over to the Mopar. Client and click file and "new Port" then enter in whatever the port is.
Step 9: Then If It says enter and start server, click Enter. If it says Login or cancel then enter in a login name and a password.
Step 10: You Are Now Ready To Use Moparscape to your fullest fun gaming advantage.[/center]
Compliments on guide:
[quote="Indiantiger"]nice this will help beginners[/quote]
[quote="Anonymous"]I just took a quick glance over your connecting to moparscape guide and you really have a nice way of writing your guides. Great job and Keep up your good work and maybe you may be a mod one day.[/quote]

item.title: How To Start Playing Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Substance Substance
item.description:
@Substance wrote:

Created By Substance I know that there are some guides out there on how to use moparscape but there have beenn many posts in this section of the forums of how to use moparscape.

This Step-By-Step guide was created entirely by me and was not leached off of any site or person.

Here Is Your Guide On " Beginning to Game on Moparscape "

[center]Guide to Moparscape (Everything you need to know about joining a server[/center]

[center]Step 1: Go To the Home Page of Moparscape.org where all the forums are located.

Step 2: Click on the RS2 Server Advertisement.

Step 3: Click a Thread of a server and enter that server’s thread.

Step 4: Look For The Ip for the server (If a thread is in the right layout you should have no problem finding it.)

Step 5: Switch over to your mopar client and click on File in the top left corner of the Client.

Step 6: Click New Server and Paste the copied ip from the forums into it. (Make sure it is just the IP and no spaces are before or after the IP.

Step 7: Go to the Thread of the server and look for the port.

Step 8: Then Again switch over to the Mopar. Client and click file and “new Port” then enter in whatever the port is.

Step 9: Then If It says enter and start server, click Enter. If it says Login or cancel then enter in a login name and a password.

Step 10: You Are Now Ready To Use Moparscape to your fullest fun gaming advantage.[/center]

Indiantiger:

nice this will help beginners

Anonymous:

I just took a quick glance over your connecting to moparscape guide and you really have a nice way of writing your guides. Great job and Keep up your good work and maybe you may be a mod one day.
